review.title: “Crazy Owner Blames Everyone but Self”
review.pros: Pros – Free lunch if you don't mind eating the same meal every day.
review.cons: Cons – Being treated like a thief when you've never stolen in your life, getting tricked into not receiving a formal offer letter or job description, being forced to work with no running water or ac in the summer when everyone else is sent home.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Have some honor and live up to your promises.
